formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Funktion in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'HASH' =-
[Syntax] HASH(hashname[,hashkey])
[Synopsis] Implementation of a dialplan associative array
[Description] In two argument mode, gets and sets values to corresponding keys within a named associative array. The single-argument mode will only work when assigned to from a function defined by func_odbc.so.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:
